short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to save all currently opened tabs in chrome with time stamp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension focuses on storing all the currently opened URLs with the time and date it had been stored . If User has a lot of important URLs opened and he/she doesn't really want to close these URLs , he/she can simply press one button which will store all his/her currently opened URLs and store them with Timestamp . Also with one click they can open all the URLs saved at once for some particular date/time .
